cause.description:
Information provided by the likes of Google, Yahoo, the BBC and other US and European websites tends to reflect Western foreign news priorities, and to be naturally biased towards Western viewpoints.
World-Says.com is a new service providing reports from the entire developing world on topical issues, ensuring that the otherwise hidden perspectives of the majority of the world are readily available to you.
1. Western media is biased towards Western priorities and perceptions.
2. World-Says.com reflects the developing world's opinions.
cause.mission: Ensuring that Developing countries' opinions are heard
cause.name: Ensuring that Developing countries' opinions are heard
